body:
Excellent! :smiley:

You used styles to customize your layout. This way your code is more modular, saving a lot of code lines.

More informations about Styles can be found [here](https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/themes.html).

In lines 25, 34 and others, you incremented the layout quality including all strings in file _/res/values/strings.xml_.

Unifying string resources in file _/res/values/strings.xml_ helps stimulates strings internationalization support.

Good job! :smiley:

Your layout is excellent!

However, it is too long. You could split it into smaller layouts.

A tip to minimize it's XML layout size is to use the tag `include`.

More informations [here](https://developer.android.com/training/improving-layouts/reusing-layouts.html).
